::Autofire::

Autofire nods at his assignment. "Allright. Those Maximals won't be 
happy. When do I leave?"



--- In nbwrpg@y..., Jeremiah <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> Megatron exited and saw Autofire, "Welcome back. Here is your 
mission
> Autofire. You are to position yourself, and part of the Decepticon 
army
> near the Maximal base. Then when I signal you, you strike. Be 
careful
> though, this is not a full scale assault, so dont rack up any 
casualties on
> our side, but dont go easy on them. You are in charge." He finishes, 
then
> enters the base. "And whatever you do, wait for my signal." He then 
heads
> towards the contro
